metadata.name: FORM #1
metadata.description:
#1 of 8 limited NFTs.

This NFT represents the Original Canvas Painting from the "Form" series I did in 2014. They were first exhibited in the Gallery Diamant, Paris, France. 

120x90 cm (47x35 inch)
Oil on canvas
2014, Paris

The concept of form is an appeal to the “form” of Aristotle.

We are only a “form”.

This art project is about the transience of life and the fragility of the human body.

Visual range is the rank of plaster heads (painting) each of which is encrusted with bloody rubies (they are also arranged in a lines).

Blood-born. It is our code and memory.

Precious stones as the most durable material and symbolizes the soul. The fragile plaster symbolizes flesh ( human body).

Any plaster sculpture will be broken, the gems will remain forever.

Our bodies are gypsum and souls are diamonds.
